name: Bubble Candy Shooter Mania
description:
Bubble Candy Shooter Mania is a very addictive Bubble Shooter - match 3 game!
We are comes and brings your tons of fresh and sweet challenges!
Ready to enjoy Bubble Candy Shooter Mania ? Get it Now !

Bubble Candy Shooter Mania Features :
- Play and enjoy discover all the wonders of Bubble Candy Shooter World.
- Dozens obstacle and magic booster that will help you progress to complete the level.
- Beautiful animation, Cute and Colorful graphics that will delight Sweet Candy World for you.
- Aim, match and clear all candy in same color and reach the goal before the moves run out!

How to Play Bubble Candy Shooter Mania :
- Simply tap and make aim to shoot 3 or more bubbles to make them crush.
- You can swap the candy bubble where you specifically aim the same candy bubble colors.
- Make the stars show up by collapse all the objective target at the top to complete the levels.
- Each stage has tons different challenging objective to complete.
- You can buy power up in the store to help you complete the levels.

The most exciting cookie game is on your device!
Thanks for anyone who supporting and playing Bubble Candy Shooter Mania!
Download now for free!
